name: Prankster
description:
You are a troller, to be more specific you're tasked with breaking into a crazed woman's house and pranking her. However, while enacting on your plan you meet a horrible fate.

Note: You have an extra-ordinary flashlight, controlled by your voice

  • Controls:

Configurable, defaults:

WASD for movement, Shift to sprint

Left mouse for toggling the flashlight

E to interact and J to open the journal
